parts.name: Ford 5.0L V8 Swap (Volvo 240/740/940)
parts.description: The 'Converge' swap. Fitting a Ford 302 (5.0L) V8 into a RWD Volvo. The distributor location on the Ford V8 clears the Volvo firewall better than a Chevy Small Block.
specs: Requires custom mounts (available from Converse Engineering etc.)
Dana 30 rear end holds up to mild V8s

parts.name: Acura Legend Dual-Piston Caliper Swap
parts.description: Upgrading Honda Civic/Integra brakes using the dual-piston calipers from an Acura Legend (GS Sedan or Coupe).
specs: Requires 11-inch rotors (Prelude VTEC or Mini Cooper S re-drilled)
Requires milling caliper bracket 3mm for some knuckles

parts.name: The 'Big 3' Electrical Upgrade
parts.description: Replacing the three main electrical cables (Alternator to Battery+, Battery- to Chassis, Engine to Chassis) with 0-gauge or 4-gauge wire. Essential for older GM cars with weak charging systems.
specs: Universal for almost all vehicles, critical for GM

parts.name: RX-7 AFM Swap (1.6L Miata)
parts.description: Swapping the restrictive Air Flow Meter (AFM) on a 1.6L Miata for the larger unit from an RX-7 (FC non-turbo).
specs: Requires swapping the electronic guts from the Miata AFM

parts.name: Crown Vic Front Suspension Swap (F100)
parts.description: Swapping the entire aluminum front crossmember, suspension, and steering from a 2003-2011 Crown Victoria into older Ford F100 trucks.
